name: Bit Souls
description:
Top-down melee combat RPG inspired by the Soulsborne genre. My second attempt at making a game, dumping in all kinds of mechanics I could think of and learning a shit ton of stuff in the making of this project.

No tutorial yet, so here are the controls:

WASD: move around and that
Left click: Attack
Right click: Special (Sword: parry, Greatsword: stab, Katana: Shuriken)
Space: Doge roll
E: Interact
Q: Use healing shard (Upgrade with souls at the lifesprings)
Tab: Switch targeting indicator

Work in progress build, still much more to come including:

  • UI stuffs
  • Sound and VFX
  • Probably a tutorial
  • Boss fight
  • Secret boss fight?
  • More levels??
  • Roguelike mode with randomly generated maps???
